text: National Singing Contest () is a South Korean music program presented by Song Hae since 1980. It airs live on KBS 1TV on Sunday at 12:10 beginning November 9, 1980. For korean holidays, the show has been hosted overseas.In 2003 the show was hosted in pyongyang during National Liberation Day of Korea.http://program.kbs.co.kr/1tv/enter/jarang/pc/detail.html?smenu=c8e571 ==History== The show originally started as a program called "kbs National singing fight(KBS배 쟁탈 전국노래자랑)" from 1972 to 1977.http://www.sporbiz.co.kr/news/articleView.html?idxno=404533K ==Description== According to the official program page, the show is described as "a show of battles of wit and exciting songs between amateur guests who passed the preliminary in their local regions which aims to make people touched, have good memories, and give honest smiles to the audience with things to be proud of the region that are unique to the area."http://program.kbs.co.kr/1tv/enter/jarang/pc/index.html ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 South Korean television series debuts Category:1980s South Korean television series Category:1990s South Korean television series Category:2000s South Korean television series Category:2010s South Korean television series Category:Korean-language television shows Category:South Korean music television shows Category:Music competitions in South Korea Category:Korean Broadcasting System original programming Category:Television productions suspended due to the COVID-19 pandemic
title: National Singing Contest
